text: has there been any discussion about a multi-image column type that would return an array of image objects?
would love to have something like this rather than make a column for every single image
for something like a product page that has multiple images it's painful dealing with image column 1 through 12
You can technically accomplish this with the foreign id column type now but I can look into it
yeah, that's true. But I think it would save a lot of extra effort if the image column type would allow more than one image or there was a new column type for this
vs to creating another table and all the additional columns and linking them together, etc.
you would still have to have all of the columns built out and import them into the second table so it is essentially the same work
But the new field is bangin
yeah i'm currently at image column number 30 something for this one project lol
